How soon will my account be ready?
All new orders are subject to approval by our billing department and may require additional details to process your order. Accounts are ready within 2 hours once approved by the billing department.

Any Content Restrictions?

Where are the servers located?
These specials are available in our USA Miami Datacenter.

Information about SwitchMIA Miami Colocation
Founded in 2006, SwitchMIA is located at one of the largest internet exchange points in the world, facilitating excellent inter-connectivity with Latin America, the Caribbean and Europe. SwitchMIA is a global provider of optimized network solutions that offer the best possible performance, reliability and availability. Our advanced, IP-based networks deliver data, voice and content to clients and partners world-wide. Offerings include colocation, transit, transport, VoIP and network-based services.

Thank you for reading and please let us know if there are any questions at tickets@switchmia.com
